### Description
<!-- 
Consider phrasing a feature request in the form of a user story (https://dannorth.net/whats-in-a-story/)

Narrative:
As a [role]
I want [feature]
So that [benefit]

-->

### Acceptance Criteria

<!--
Scenario 1: Title
Given [context]
  And [some more context]...
When  [event]
Then  [outcome]

Scenario 2: ...
